successes.title: Wishbone: The World's Smallest Smart Thermometer
successes.description: Wishbone is the world's smallest and easiest-to-use smart thermometer. It can accurately check body, object or environment temperature.

Pledges.description: Thank you for your supporting our project. We will keep you updated and will include your name on our website's supporter list.
One Wishbone with color of your choice. (If stretch goals are met, more colors will be available)
One Wishbone with color of your choice. (If stretch goals are met, more colors will be available)
Two (2) Wishbones with color of your choice. (If stretch goals are met, more colors will be available)
You can pick different colors for each Wishbone
